text: @RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump O V E R S I G H T is desperately needed during the Trump administration. Thank you Speaker Pelosi for putting together a bipartisan team to monitor our tax dollars for #covid19 relief — The United States Treasury is not a cookie jar.
